title: Halo Spartan Assault-CODEX
description:
CODEX PRESENTS:

Halo Spartan Assault

Release Date: 3/2014 Protection: Steam
Discs: 1 Genre: Action
Halo: Spartan Assault brings the excitement of Halo combat
to Steam for the very first time. Battle your way through
30 action-packed missions against the Covenant as you explore
the origin of the Spartan Ops program featured in Halo 4
*DirectX feature level 10 required

Extract
Burn or mount the .iso
Run setup and install the Game
Copy crack from CODEX folder to your installData dir !!
Play

Block game exe in your firewall to prevent the game
trying to go online

CODEX is currently looking for:

nothing but competition!

are you ready?

LNK^CPS 02/2014


System Requirements:

OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8 and 8.1 
Processor: Dual core processor 
Memory: 1 GB RAM 
Graphics: DirectX10 compatible graphics card w/ dedicated 512MB RAM 
(ATI Radeon 3670, NVIDIA 8600 GT or Intel HD 3000) 
DirectX: Version 10 
Hard Drive: 2550 MB available space 
Additional Notes: ** DirectX feature level 10 required **
